name: wss-node
description: 1. Create a new directory for your project and navigate to it using the command line. mkdir real-time-chat-app cd real-time-chat-app 2. Initialize a new Node.js project: Run the following command in the project directory to create a new package.json file. npm init -y 3.Install the required dependencies: Install Socket.IO packages by running the following command. npm install express socket.io 4.Create code index.js, index.html, style.css 5. Run server node index.js
